intro: Ride the rhythm through a cyberpunk future with 28 amazing songs!
description:
BECOME A SYNTH RIDER IN A FUTURISTIC MUSICAL WORLD: 
Experience a high-octane cyberpunk musical adventure where you catch notes, weave through obstacles, and ride neon rails in perfect sync with the beat.  Grab your hoverboard and perform epic air stunts in retro futuristic cityscapes!

MULTIPLAYER MUSICAL MAYHEM:
Up to FOUR PLAYERS can throw down in VERSUS or jump into a COUCH CO-OP mode where all players must work together and share the beat!  Whether you’re score chasing or rhythm riding as a group, all skill levels are welcome in Synth Riders.

BROAD LIBRARY OF MUSIC OPTIONS:
Based on its synthwave roots, the soundtrack features 28 songs from amazing artists, including Sunset Neon, Dance with the Dead, Jamie Berry…and many more!

THE PARTY DOESN’T STOP: 
Crave more epic sessions? Explore DLC artist packs featuring Lady Gaga, Gorillaz, Monstercat artists and more – each bringing new beats and movements to take on!
THE FATE OF THE CITY IS IN YOUR HANDS IN CAMPAIGN MODE! 
Rebels are racing against time to stop ruthless AI from seizing control in this adrenaline-fueled musical battleground. Can you defeat XANDER?
